channel.title: Im sorry [Notifaction]
channel.description:
Im sorry moparscape staff (I had to say this)
Guy's this is a place were we could assist you with your server...
This is not the place were you come so we can code for you...
This is also not the place were you request for a coder\hoster.
And last but not least THIS IS NOT THE PLACE WERE WE SPOON FEED YOU!
I could accept the fact when someone says I don't get it could you teach me about it...
But when the conversation is like this...
Helper: "Hey, How could I help you out today?" Person in need of help: "I need to make the name of my client change.." Helper: "Oh I could do that easy just go to your client.java or Jframe if you have it.. That is if your server is 317 or 474" Person in need of help: "Could you do it for me on Team veiwer?"

item.title: Im sorry [Notifaction]
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Thanks I guess, but this really isn’t needed. We have a set of rules telling people this.

Read full topic

item.title: Im sorry [Notifaction]
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

Yea, I guess would be a common mistake.

Read full topic

item.title: Im sorry [Notifaction]
item.dc:creator: @Pure_str433 Pure str433
item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

True true, I didn’t fully read the part about teamviewer… I guess, like 80% of topics now include the word “Teamviewer”

Read full topic

item.title: Im sorry [Notifaction]
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

It was a example… -_-

       And yes I was once a "Noob" but because of this site they showed me how to become a good coder... (I don't want people just using this site so they can have there server and then just leave after they got there info they need to learn or they will keep coming back)

Read full topic

item.title: Im sorry [Notifaction]
item.dc:creator: @Pure_str433 Pure str433
item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

Abuse, if you don’t know how to change a client name, your either retarded or a noob.

Read full topic

item.title: Im sorry [Notifaction]
item.dc:creator: @AbuseYourUsername AbuseYourUsername
item.description:
@AbuseYourUsername wrote:

He’s not saying that them people are ‘noobs’.

Read full topic

item.title: Im sorry [Notifaction]
item.dc:creator: @Pure_str433 Pure str433
item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

You were once a noob too.

And dude, even if you say this, people will still post.

ALTHOUGH, when I started coding I neve had teamviewer so I guess that’s pretty f’ed up

Read full topic

item.title: Im sorry [Notifaction]
item.dc:creator: @AbuseYourUsername AbuseYourUsername
item.description:
@AbuseYourUsername wrote:

I agree, if we do it for them they’ll never know how to do it themselves.

Read full topic
